title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2162.3 - Ineligible costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2162.3 - Ineligible costs

State Regulations

Grant funds exceeding ten percent of the Total Development

Cost of the project may not be applied to administrative costs incurred by an
eligible applicant or grantee, nor to any other costs which are not directly
related to the construction, rehabilitation or improvement of homes. In the
event that homes are to be located in a mixed-use structure, then any costs
associated with the nonresidential uses are ineligible costs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2162.3

Amended

New

York State Register April 12, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 15, eff. 4/12/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
